translations: 马屁股；臀部；兜在马尾下的皮带

sentences.sentence: Waterloo bears divine right on its crupper.
Crupper: a leather strap looped under a horse's tail and attached to a harness or saddle to keep it from slipping forward.
sentences.translation: 牵鞍兜带：穿过马尾下面的一皮革圈套，用来扣紧马具或马鞍以防止它向前滑动。

sentences.sentence: Now when he met him the man who then seemed already extremely weary had requested him to take him on his crupper to which the fishmonger had made no reply except by redoubling his gait.
sentences.translation: 那外来人在遇见他时曾请求让他坐在马臀上，他当时已显得非常困顿了，那鱼贩子却一面支吾，一面加鞭走了。
